name: The Mailman (MorrisElHelou)
description:
HOW  TO PLAY:

A Customer will come in he will ask for you to envelope, stamp or box his paper,

before you put it in an envelope, stamp the item, and before you put it in the box, stamp it then envelope it, then you can put it in the box and after you press the check button next to your paper and if the item is not what the customer expected you will lose time but if it is what the customer wants you will recieve time and if you press the remove button that means you made a mistake you will lose time so becareful not to make a mistake.

If the Time reaches 0 you lose good luck :)

BUGS:

i have found buys and fixed them so if you downloaded any version else than the one one October 3 make sure you download the latest one that was uploaded on October 3, Thank you :)
